A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just a mess of a movie\, much less a Star Wars movie. Totally inconsistent tone (Harry Potter magic goat chase vs. people getting chopped in half and blended into salsa on screen). Depressing\, needlessly nihilistic. Poe is completely out of character\, Holdo is a terrible commander (where she isn't outright dumb).\n\nBut the worst crime is the complete destruction of Luke\, ie\, one of the finest heroes in fiction. Now he'll always be a coward\, a child murderer\, and a fool. Thanks for that.
